proposal1.heroHeadline: Patch is losing over 300 hours annually on proposal creation. Here is how it adds up.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Manually crafting proposals for SEO, PPC, and social marketing wastes hours. Generate them in 47 seconds with automation.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are the ongoing losses bleeding your resources.

problems.title: Time-Consuming Proposals
problems.description: Each proposal takes hours that could be used to refine SEO strategies. You're losing valuable optimization time.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Paying staff to manually write proposals costs thousands annually. This is money that could expand your paid social campaigns.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: Slow proposal generation means potential clients wait. Each delay risks losing media buying opportunities to quicker competitors.

problems.title: Inconsistency Issues
problems.description: Manual proposals vary in quality, affecting brand perception. Each inconsistency can dilute your award-winning status.

problems.title: Lost Deals
problems.description: Every day spent on proposal writing is a day not spent closing deals. Every lost day is a potential lost contract.

problems.title: Resource Drain
problems.description: Proposal creation diverts resources from enhancing email marketing. This shift weakens your data-led marketing strength.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces every inefficiency described above.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, creating a proposal takes hours of manual work. With our system, it's done in 47 seconds.

solutions.title: Brand Consistency
solutions.description: Manual creation means risking brand inconsistency. Our system ensures every proposal aligns with your brand seamlessly.

solutions.title: Cost Reduction
solutions.description: High labor costs for proposal writing drain resources. Automating this process cuts costs significantly.

solutions.title: Enhanced Productivity
solutions.description: Currently, proposal writing drains your team's time. Free them up to focus on strategic growth areas instead.

solutions.title: Improved Client Engagement
solutions.description: Slow responses frustrate potential clients. With quick proposals, engage clients faster and win more business.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Patch's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Patch around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Patch.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Online Presence with Data-Led Marketing.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Combining our expertise in SEO, PPC, and social marketing to elevate your reach and drive meaningful engagement.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Each unconverted lead is potential revenue lost for Acme Corp.

problems.title: Low Website Traffic
problems.description: With less than 1,000 monthly visitors, Acme Corp is missing out on valuable market exposure. This results in fewer inquiries and sales opportunities.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: A bounce rate of 70% indicates that visitors are not finding what they need. This means a significant portion of potential customers are leaving the site without engaging.

problems.title: Poor Search Visibility
problems.description: Ranking low on search engines causes Acme Corp to lose visibility to competitors. This results in missed opportunities to capture organic traffic.

problems.title: Unoptimized PPC Campaigns
problems.description: Current PPC campaigns show a low conversion rate of 1%. This is a loss of potential ROI due to not reaching the right audience effectively.

problems.title: Ineffective Social Strategy
problems.description: With only 500 followers across platforms, social media presence is minimal. This limits Acme Corp's ability to engage with its target audience and build brand loyalty.

problems.title: Underutilized Email Marketing
problems.description: An open rate of just 10% means emails are not resonating with the audience. This results in lost opportunities for direct engagement with potential customers.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions directly address each of these challenges.

solutions.title: SEO
solutions.description: Improve search rankings to increase visibility and drive organic traffic. This will ensure your site meets user needs and captures potential leads.

solutions.title: PPC
solutions.description: Run targeted PPC campaigns to generate qualified leads. Aligning search behavior with customer needs will optimize budget spend.

solutions.title: Social Marketing
solutions.description: Tailor social strategies to enhance brand engagement. This approach will grow your audience and strengthen customer relationships.

solutions.title: Email Marketing
solutions.description: Craft goal-focused email campaigns to increase open rates. This direct line to customers will enhance engagement and conversion.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Patch offers unparalleled expertise in data-led marketing to drive relevant inquiries.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team has a track record of elevating brands through strategic marketing solutions.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven
whyUsCards.description: We rely on analytics to shape strategies tailored to your business needs.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with you to ensure strategies align with your business goals.

whyUsCards.title: Results Focused
whyUsCards.description: Our priority is delivering measurable results that boost your bottom line.

proposal2.teamIntro: Our team is dedicated to transforming your marketing strategy.

team.name: Jackson Clark
team.bio: Jackson leads strategy and client relationships with a focus on delivering impactful marketing solutions. His expertise ensures each project achieves its goals.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Analysis
process.description: Understanding your business needs and current challenges.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: Creating a tailored marketing strategy for your business.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose from our investment options to suit your business needs.

pricing.name: Basic Package
pricing.description: Ideal for small businesses looking to enhance their online presence.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses aiming for significant growth and market expansion.

pricing.name: Premium Package
pricing.description: Best for enterprises seeking comprehensive digital marketing solutions.

proposal2.ctaDescription: We invite you to a conversation about how we can support your business growth.
proposal2.footerSub: Driving relevant inquiries through data-led marketing.

lead.company_description:
We help venue, event and hospitality brands exceed targets and expectations through creative digital marketing campaigns and experiences.

  ?
Patch Marketing is a full-service marketing agency working with the best of the UK's event industry. Founded in 2010, our brand has continued to grow from strength to strength as we've kept our values, transparency, honesty, and partnership close to the core of Patch. 

We're a results-driven business filled with a team of consultants and specialists that cover every corner of marketing and can help with everything from multi-channel strategy and planning to overseeing a single channel project.

If you want to learn more about how Patch can help you exceed targets and increase conversions, drop us a line, info@patch.marketing.
